splashScreen.Purpose of Uçurtma: Uçurtma is a platform that aims to help students find the financial support they need to make their dreams come true.
splashScreen.Uçurtma is decentralized: It provides a decentralized guarantee of getting support by bringing students and supporters together.
splashScreen.clickHereToDonateAllCampaigns: Now, you can support all campaigns in one go! <2>Click here</2> to learn details and support.

problemAndSolution.New solution with blockchain: New generation solution that works with blockchain
problemAndSolution.What was the problem: Our platform enables students to crowdfund the monetary support they need throughout the year using the smart contracts we built in Ethereum. Uçurtma allows students to collect donations with cryptocurrency of their choice and allows them to cash out the money to their bank accounts with no extra charge or fees. Therefore, while their finance and future fund is in their control, their supporters can also follow the student's academic growth through our platform transparently.
problemAndSolution.Safe_details: All transactions are performed with digital signatures encrypted by the elliptical curve method in the students crypto wallets.
problemAndSolution.Transparent_details: All money transfers can be monitored transparently and supporters can track the achievements of the student they support using our platform.
problemAndSolution.Fast_details: After the student campaigns are completed, their support is paid to the students quickly on time without any further action. Everything is automatically handled and no interaction needed.

howItWorks.Examine_details: Choose a student you want to support.
howItWorks.Support_details: Click the support button and take your reference code. Follow the instructions and support the student of your choice using on-chain or off-chain transactions.
howItWorks.Follow_details: Follow the student's developments and achievements.
howItWorks.Three Steps: You can help a student to achieve their dream in three easy steps.

whatWillProvide.question: What is Uçurtma providing me?
whatWillProvide.answer: Uçurtma is a platform where students who need support can collect money to cover their expenses. Using the platform, you can safely collect support and meet your needs in the long run.

whatWillProvideDonator.question: What will Uçurtma provide me?
whatWillProvideDonator.answer: Uçurtma will help you to find the students you will support. It provides you with transparent, auditable and safe platform to help the students in need.

howApply.question: How should I apply?
howApply.answer: You can make a pre-application with your photo, personal information and student certificate which you can access from e-devlet. So that, we can confirm the accuracy of this information and then create the campaign page where you can gather support together.

howEvaluate.question: How will my application be evaluated?
howEvaluate.answer: As Uçurtma, we believe that every student should have equal opportunities. Therefore, our evaluation after the application only aims to check the accuracy of the applications. All students whose accuracy we have approved will be allowed to create a campaign.

gettingSupport.question: How do I get support?
gettingSupport.answer: Payments are transferred to your BiLira wallet every 28 days. After that, you can transfer this money to your own bank account with your BiLira account or spend it on companies that work with BiLira.

gettingPayment.question: How will the payments be made?
gettingPayment.answer: You can receive payments by transferring them to your wallet over the Ethereum network. This is an important process for securing the money and for controlling your money.

needCampaignPage.question: Do I need to create campaign page to get support?
needCampaignPage.answer: Yes, you need a campaign page to get support. However, if you want, you can set privacy settings for this campaign page public to private. In this way, you will allow the campaign to be shared only with the people you want and they will support them through Uçurtma.

supportDuration.question: Will I continue to receive support until my education is over?
supportDuration.answer: You will continue to receive support as long as you continue to meet the promised conditions/goals as a result of our periodic checks. All of the support you collect will be stored on the blockchain as long as you transparently meet the conditions and no one but you will be able to access that money.

whoIsAdmin.question: Who will manage my support account?
whoIsAdmin.answer: No one else will have access to this account except you, including Uçurtma team. Your support account will be stored as a smart contract created on the blockchain, and you will be able to withdraw money from this account thanks to the digital wallet you created. But if you lose access to the wallet, you will lose the money you have deposited there.

paymentMethods.question: Which payment methods can I use to support students?
paymentMethods.answer: In order to support a student on the Uçurtma, you can make your payment by bank transfer or EFT to the account number you can obtain from the student's campaign page. In the meantime, do not forget to add the reference code given to you in the explanations!

maxAndMin.question: What are the maximum and minimum support amounts?
maxAndMin.answer: The minimum amount you have to pay to support a student is 100 TL or more. If you send an amount less than that, your money will be transferred back to your bank account. The maximum amount you can pay is 1500 TL.

canIReport.question: Can I complain if I am not satisfied with the student I support?
canIReport.answer: You can send us any concerns you have about the students you support using the Report button on the campaign page.

sameTimeMulti.question: Can I support more than one student in the same time?
sameTimeMulti.answer: As long as the total amount does not exceed 1500 TL at the same time, you can support more than one student.

anonimity.question: Can I support students by keeping my identity anonymous?
anonimity.answer: The students you support do not know who their supporters are. These supports are kept securely and confidentially in our database and on BiLira due to legal liability.

featuredCampaign.noFund: Nothing here yet. <campaignButton>Click here</campaignButton> to be the first one who supports.
featuredCampaign.donate: {{count}} people supported this campaign. Click here to join them.

donateAll.heading: You can now support the funding pool! Funds will be shared across all the campaigns.
donateAll.definition: If you are struggling to find the person to support, you can send your money to the funding pool! All the funds will be distribtured among active campaigns once a month.

1.title: Select Payment Method
1.desc: Choose between Bank Transfer or Ethereum transaction. Follow the steps and create your BiLira Account. Fill the form and make the transactions!

2.title: Send Your Support
2.desc: Complete the bank transfer using the reference number and the IBAN.

3.title: Make happy, be happy.
3.desc: That's it! You've completed all the steps! The money will be kept safe using our funding pool smart contract, and will be distributed fairly based on how much money the students will need!

campaignHeader.noSupporterFound: Nothing here so far. <redirectLink>Click here</redirectLink> to be the first supporter.
campaignHeader.moneySendingBack: Funds have been reverted back to the original supports.

ethereumFlow.onlyBiLira: This campaign accepts only BiLira token. Any other tokens you send to this contract will cause you to lose them irreversibly.

bankTransferFlow.aboutBanks: Bank accounts are payment channels provided by BiLira. Even if you do not have an account in one of these bank accounts, you have the option to send via EFT.
